From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Megaton sticks close to Megatron and Shackwave watching thier every move. He
knew that Megatron wouldn't attempt anything against him while recovering
from thebattle but this other bot didn't seem as trustworthy. he transformed
to his somewhat robotic form, he had T-Rex legs, dragon claws, his Dragon
head folded behind him revealing a robotic head that was no more than a
larger version of Megatrons. his two tails folded onto his dragon claws
looking like spears. He was a freakish looking mutant with Megatrons
military genius. He didn't consider himself a mutant, he considered himself
as the advanced model.

"What next Megatron?" he asked curiously trying to learn the Predacons way
of thinking.
----- Original Message -----
From: <JP3884@...>

Sent: Saturday, January 13, 2001 6:29 AM
Subject: Re: Neutral base under attack!!!!!


>     Megatron turned to Shockwave, "Thank you for your assistance in this
> matter. If there is anything you would like, please, let me know. Yes."
>
>     The Energonians suddenly saw the massive firepower explode from the
> trees. A quick attempt to seperate only resulted in a gigantic arial
> explosion sending the four crashing to the forrest floor.
>     Putnam got up, as did the others, and cursed in the darkness of the
bleak
> woods around them. Slowly, the missle debris fell like ash on them.
>     "They escaped. Ominous isnt going to like this one bit." Putnam said,
> scanning the area for Killfest and his men. "We had better return to the
Orb."
>
>
>
